text: Shannen Doherty Net Worth and salary: Shannen Doherty is an American actress, producer, director and author who has a net worth of $10 million. Shannen Doherty is a Memphis-born television star who began acting as a kid with several short TV appearances before she was cast as Jenny Wilder in "Little House on the Prairie". Doherty took several roles throughout the '80s, appearing in "Girls Just Want to Have Fun" with Sarah Jessica Parker and Helen Hunt, "Our House", "Magnum, P.I." and "Heathers". She made her "Beverly Hills, 90210" debut in 1990 as Brenda Walsh. Doherty gained notoriety for her portrayal of Brenda, earning a Young Artist Award nomination and a spot on "E!"'s list of the Wicked Women of Prime Time. She left the show after four seasons, going on to act in several TV movies, "Mallrats" and "Charmed". During the 2000s, Doherty hosted a SyFy Channel show, had her own reality program on Oxygen and reappeared on a "Beverly Hills, 90210" reunion special. Doherty put her dancing skills to the test on the tenth season of "Dancing with the Stars" with Mark Ballas before she was eliminated in the second round. She married husband Kurt Iswarienko in 2011. She has been married twice before, most famously to Rick Solomon from 2002-2003.
